commands.title: n8n Docker: Full docker-compose stack
commands.body:
version: '3.8'
services:
  n8n:
    image: n8nio/n8n:latest
    container_name: n8n
    restart: unless-stopped
    ports:
      - "5678:5678"
    environment:
      - N8N_HOST={{your-domain.com}}
      - N8N_PROTOCOL=https
      - WEBHOOK_URL=https://{{your-domain.com}}
      - N8N_ENCRYPTION_KEY={{your-encryption-key}}
      - DB_TYPE=postgresdb
      - DB_POSTGRESDB_HOST=postgres
      - DB_POSTGRESDB_DATABASE=n8n
      - DB_POSTGRESDB_USER=n8n
      - DB_POSTGRESDB_PASSWORD={{db-password}}
    volumes:
      - n8n_data:/home/node/.n8n
    depends_on:
      - postgres
  
  postgres:
    image: postgres:16
    restart: unless-stopped
    environment:
      - POSTGRES_DB=n8n
      - POSTGRES_USER=n8n
      - POSTGRES_PASSWORD={{db-password}}
    volumes:
      - postgres_data:/var/lib/postgresql/data

volumes:
  n8n_data:
  postgres_data:
commands.description: Production-ready docker-compose for n8n with PostgreSQL - complete setup (docs.n8n.io/hosting/installation/server-setups/docker-compose/)

commands.title: n8n Docker: Queue mode docker-compose
commands.body:
version: '3.8'
services:
  n8n-main:
    image: n8nio/n8n:latest
    container_name: n8n-main
    restart: unless-stopped
    ports:
      - "5678:5678"
    environment:
      - EXECUTIONS_MODE=queue
      - QUEUE_BULL_REDIS_HOST=redis
      - DB_TYPE=postgresdb
      - DB_POSTGRESDB_HOST=postgres
      - N8N_ENCRYPTION_KEY={{encryption-key}}
    depends_on:
      - postgres
      - redis
  
  n8n-worker:
    image: n8nio/n8n:latest
    restart: unless-stopped
    command: worker
    environment:
      - EXECUTIONS_MODE=queue
      - QUEUE_BULL_REDIS_HOST=redis
      - DB_TYPE=postgresdb
      - DB_POSTGRESDB_HOST=postgres
      - N8N_ENCRYPTION_KEY={{encryption-key}}
    depends_on:
      - postgres
      - redis
  
  redis:
    image: redis:7-alpine
    restart: unless-stopped
  
  postgres:
    image: postgres:16
    restart: unless-stopped
    environment:
      - POSTGRES_DB=n8n
      - POSTGRES_USER=n8n
      - POSTGRES_PASSWORD={{password}}
    volumes:
      - postgres_data:/var/lib/postgresql/data

volumes:
  postgres_data:
commands.description: n8n queue mode with workers for horizontal scaling - production setup (docs.n8n.io/hosting/scaling/queue-mode/)

commands.title: n8n Docker: Start n8n with docker-compose
commands.description: Start all n8n services in detached mode - begins n8n stack (docs.n8n.io/hosting/installation/server-setups/docker-compose/)

commands.title: n8n Docker: Stop and remove containers
commands.description: Stop and remove all n8n containers - preserves volumes (docs.n8n.io/hosting/installation/server-setups/docker-compose/)

commands.title: n8n Docker: View all service logs
commands.description: Follow logs from all services (n8n, postgres, redis) - comprehensive monitoring (docs.n8n.io/hosting/logging-monitoring/logging/)

commands.title: n8n Docker: View specific service logs
commands.description: Follow logs for specific service (e.g., n8n, postgres, n8n-worker) - isolated debugging (docs.n8n.io/hosting/logging-monitoring/logging/)

commands.title: n8n Docker: Restart specific service
commands.description: Restart specific service without affecting others - quick troubleshooting (docs.n8n.io/hosting/installation/server-setups/docker-compose/)

commands.title: n8n Docker: Pull latest n8n image
commands.description: Pull latest n8n image before updating - check for new version (docs.n8n.io/hosting/installation/server-setups/docker-compose/)

commands.title: n8n Docker: Update n8n to latest
commands.description: Pull latest images and recreate containers - safe update process (docs.n8n.io/hosting/installation/server-setups/docker-compose/)

commands.title: n8n Docker: Check running containers
commands.description: List all containers and their status - verify all services running (docs.n8n.io/hosting/installation/server-setups/docker-compose/)

commands.title: n8n Docker: Execute command in n8n container
commands.description: Run command in running n8n container - alternative to docker exec (docs.n8n.io/hosting/installation/server-setups/docker-compose/)

commands.title: n8n Docker: Open bash shell in container
commands.description: Open interactive shell in n8n container for debugging - direct container access (docs.n8n.io/hosting/installation/docker/)

commands.title: n8n Docker: Scale workers
commands.description: Scale number of worker containers for queue mode - horizontal scaling (docs.n8n.io/hosting/scaling/queue-mode/)

commands.title: n8n Docker: View container resource usage
commands.description: Monitor CPU, memory, network for all containers - real-time resource monitoring (docs.n8n.io/hosting/scaling/)

commands.title: n8n Docker: Backup n8n data volume
commands.body: docker run --rm -v n8n_data:/data -v $(pwd):/backup alpine tar czf /backup/n8n-data-backup-$(date +%Y%m%d).tar.gz -C /data .
commands.description: Create compressed backup of n8n data volume - includes workflows, credentials, logs (docs.n8n.io/hosting/installation/docker/)

commands.title: n8n Docker: Restore n8n data volume
commands.body: docker run --rm -v n8n_data:/data -v $(pwd):/backup alpine sh -c "cd /data && tar xzf /backup/{{backup-file.tar.gz}} --strip 1"
commands.description: Restore n8n data from backup archive - recover from backup (docs.n8n.io/hosting/installation/docker/)

commands.title: n8n Docker: Clean up stopped containers and volumes
commands.description: Remove containers AND volumes - WARNING: deletes all data (docs.n8n.io/hosting/installation/server-setups/docker-compose/)

commands.title: n8n Docker: Rebuild containers
commands.description: Force rebuild and recreate all containers - useful after config changes (docs.n8n.io/hosting/installation/server-setups/docker-compose/)

commands.title: n8n K8s: Install n8n with Helm
commands.body:
helm repo add community-charts https://community-charts.github.io/helm-charts
helm repo update
kubectl create namespace n8n
helm install n8n community-charts/n8n --namespace n8n
commands.description: Install n8n on Kubernetes using Helm chart - quick deployment (community-charts.github.io/docs/charts/n8n/usage)

commands.title: n8n K8s: Install n8n with custom values
commands.body:
helm install n8n community-charts/n8n \
  --namespace n8n \
  --set config.host={{your-domain.com}} \
  --set config.protocol=https \
  --set postgresql.enabled=true \
  --set redis.enabled=true \
  --set scaling.enabled=true
commands.description: Install n8n with custom configuration - production-ready setup (community-charts.github.io/docs/charts/n8n/usage)

commands.title: n8n K8s: Get n8n pods
commands.description: List all n8n pods in namespace - check deployment status (community-charts.github.io/docs/charts/n8n/)

commands.title: n8n K8s: Get n8n pod logs
commands.description: Follow n8n pod logs in real-time - monitor application (community-charts.github.io/docs/charts/n8n/)

commands.title: n8n K8s: Get worker pod logs
commands.description: Follow n8n worker pod logs - debug queue processing (community-charts.github.io/docs/charts/n8n/queue-mode)

commands.title: n8n K8s: Describe n8n pod
commands.description: Show detailed pod information including events - troubleshoot pod issues (community-charts.github.io/docs/charts/n8n/)

commands.title: n8n K8s: Execute command in pod
commands.description: Open shell in n8n pod for debugging - direct pod access (community-charts.github.io/docs/charts/n8n/)

commands.title: n8n K8s: Port forward to n8n service
commands.description: Forward local port to n8n service - access n8n locally for testing (community-charts.github.io/docs/charts/n8n/)

commands.title: n8n K8s: Scale workers
commands.description: Scale n8n worker deployment - adjust processing capacity (community-charts.github.io/docs/charts/n8n/queue-mode)

commands.title: n8n K8s: Restart n8n deployment
commands.body: kubectl rollout restart deployment -n n8n n8n
commands.description: Trigger rolling restart of n8n pods - apply configuration changes (community-charts.github.io/docs/charts/n8n/)

commands.title: n8n K8s: Check rollout status
commands.body: kubectl rollout status deployment -n n8n n8n
commands.description: Monitor deployment rollout progress - verify update completion (community-charts.github.io/docs/charts/n8n/)

commands.title: n8n K8s: Get n8n service details
commands.description: List n8n services and their endpoints - verify network configuration (community-charts.github.io/docs/charts/n8n/)

commands.title: n8n K8s: Get n8n ingress
commands.description: Show ingress configuration - verify external access setup (community-charts.github.io/docs/charts/n8n/)

commands.title: n8n K8s: Get persistent volumes
commands.description: List persistent volume claims - verify storage configuration (community-charts.github.io/docs/charts/n8n/)

commands.title: n8n K8s: Get configmaps
commands.description: List configuration maps - check configuration storage (community-charts.github.io/docs/charts/n8n/)

commands.title: n8n K8s: Get secrets
commands.description: List secrets in namespace - verify credentials storage (community-charts.github.io/docs/charts/n8n/)

commands.title: n8n K8s: View Helm values
commands.description: Show current Helm chart values - review configuration (community-charts.github.io/docs/charts/n8n/)

commands.title: n8n K8s: Upgrade n8n with Helm
commands.description: Upgrade n8n to latest chart version - apply updates (community-charts.github.io/docs/charts/n8n/)

commands.title: n8n K8s: Uninstall n8n

commands.title: n8n K8s: Check pod resource usage
